alert.note: Alert for Dorchester; Wicomico (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 5:12PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...Scattered strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Wicomico and Dorchester Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 512 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking scattered strong thunderstorms near Calvert Cliffs, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Taylors Island around 520 PM EDT. University Of Maryland Center For Environmental Studies around 540 PM EDT. Cambridge around 545 PM EDT. Secretary around 555 PM EDT. Hurlock and Vienna around 605 PM EDT. Sharptown around 615 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Galestown, Madison, Brookview, Eldorado, Hudson, Church Creek, Lloyds, Mardela Springs, Taylors Island and Woolford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
